bill.summary:
Observes and recognizes the new crisis of voter suppression tactics that have been enacted by states and localities since the Shelby County v. Holder Supreme Court decision.
Urges congressional leadership to allow for an immediate vote on the Voting Rights Advancement Act of 2015.
